name: Denzel's Growth Lab
description:
Denzel's Growth Lab

Help Denzel complete his Growth Lab! Equipped with velocity and growth guns, Denzel has the power to control the size and position of objects at his fingertips. Can you help him complete a set of 10 levels to prove that Denzel's Growth Lab is a success?

This game was created for the 2022 Kenney Jam, for which the theme was 'Growth'.

Denzel's Growth Lab is a prototype puzzle-platformer where you must control the size of objects to solve 10 puzzle levels. Any solution is acceptable in this physics-defying simulation!
